mapper.select: SELECT a.*, u.u_name FROM article a LEFT JOIN user u ON a.a_writer = u.u_id group by a.a_id order by a.timestamp desc limit #{start}, #{end}
mapper.insert: INSERT article (loginId, passwd, name, email, userType, departmentId) VALUES (#{loginId}, #{passwd}, #{name}, #{email#}, #{userType}, #{departmentId})
mapper.update: UPDATE [User] SET loginId = #{loginId}, name = #{name}, email = #{email}, userType = #{userType}, departmentId = #{departmentId} WHERE id = #{id}
